title: Blended Computer-Mediated Learning Design Course for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer proficiency and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: A blended model combining real-time online instruction with offline activities using personal devices, aiming to enhance social domain job competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can perform collaborative problem-solving activities with peers at least twice weekly on online discussion platforms
Learners acquire methods to express social presence using digital communication tools (video conferencing, chat, etc.) in blended learning environments
Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in digital literacy competencies required for social sector job performance by the end of the 6-month course

resources: Zoom Account and Video Conferencing System

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
